short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool integrated with the Google search that allow you to show where your site in the search result without searching manually.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Find My Website** is a very useful tool for website owners. ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»
  
The tool contains some useful tools while you are using Google search engine. ğŸ”  

This tool includes:  

****** 1ï¸âƒ£ Numbering search results on Google ******  

The tool will show you the numbering of search results from **1ï¸âƒ£** to the last search result. ğŸ”¢ This feature will help you know the number of results that appear to you during your search. ğŸ“Š  

****** â¬†ï¸ Go to top button ******  

Often when you browse search results, you will scroll to the bottom. ğŸ“œ This feature will help you, with one click of a button, to rise to the initial search result very quickly. ğŸƒâ€â™‚ï¸ğŸ’¨  

****** ğŸ“ The ability to find the location of your site in Google search results without searching for it manually ******  

The most important feature of the tool is the feature of searching for the location of your site. ğŸŒ  

When your site appears in the search result, the tool will show you the number of times your site appears in the search result, ğŸ” in addition to that it will tell you the number of the search result in which your site appeared. ğŸ“ˆ In addition, you can click on the search result number to go directly to the center of your site. ğŸ¯  

In this tool, we created a **distinctive color** ğŸ¨ for your site results, so you will recognize it among all the search results. ğŸŒŸ  

In the extension icon, it allows you to add an **unlimited number of sites** ğŸ“ whose position you want to track while browsing Google search results. ğŸš€  

****** â“ Show FAQ in search result ******  

The tool will show you all the **questions that people have asked**, ğŸ’¬ with the ability to click on the question to display it as a search term. âœ…  

****** ğŸ› ï¸ Extracting similar words in the Google search bar ******  

A new button will appear for you in the Google search bar. ğŸ“Œ This button will **extract search words similar** to the search words you are looking for. ğŸ”¤
